name: IL-2: Forgotten Battles Ace Expansion Pack
name_original: IL-2: Forgotten Battles Ace Expansion Pack
description:
IL-2: Forgotten Battles Ace Expansion Pack is a simulation game developed by 1C: Maddox Games. It came out on 12-03-2004. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play IL-2: Forgotten Battles Ace Expansion Pack on PC.
